action.name: Mount squashfs file
action.command: DEVICE=$(udisksctl loop-setup -r -f '%f' | grep -o '/dev/loop[0-9]*'); MOUNT=$(udisksctl mount -b ${DEVICE} | grep -o '/media/.*[^.]'); xdg-open "$MOUNT";

action.name: Mount ISO
Munta ISO
Montar ISO
Monter ISO
Monta ISO
ISOをマウント
Koppel ISO
Montar ISO
Montar ISO
Montera ISO
action.command: DEVICE=$(udisksctl loop-setup -r -f '%f' | grep -o '/dev/loop[0-9]*'); MOUNT=$(udisksctl mount -b ${DEVICE}p1 | grep -o '/media/.*[^.]'); xdg-open "$MOUNT";
action.description: ISOファイルをマウントする
